TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SuppressIldasmAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class SuppressIldasmAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class SuppressIldasmAttribute sealed : Attribute

span.span: Prevents the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) from disassembling an assembly.

summary.span: Klasa ta nie może być dziedziczona.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Zastosuj atrybutu zestawu lub modułu, aby uniemożliwić zestawu lub modułu za pomocą [Ildasm.exe (dezasembler IL)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md).Apply the attribute to an assembly or module to prevent the assembly or module from being disassembled using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md). Ten atrybut nie zapobiega zestawu przed wyświetlać za pomocą odbicia.This attribute does not prevent an assembly from being viewed using reflection. Należy pamiętać, że atrybutu nie blokuje [Ildasm.exe (dezasembler IL)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) wyświetlać informacje o nagłówku i informacji.Note that attribute does not block the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) from viewing header information and meta-information. ## Examples W poniższym przykładzie kodu pokazano sposób stosowania atrybutu do zestawu.The following code example demonstrates how to apply the attribute to an assembly. [!code-csharp[Runtime.CompilerServices.SuppressIldasmAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.CompilerServices.SuppressIldasmAttribute/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.CompilerServices.SuppressIldasmAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.CompilerServices.SuppressIldasmAttribute/vb/sample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks Zastosuj atrybutu zestawu lub modułu, aby uniemożliwić zestawu lub modułu za pomocą [Ildasm.exe (dezasembler IL)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md).Apply the attribute to an assembly or module to prevent the assembly or module from being disassembled using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md). ## Examples W poniższym przykładzie kodu pokazano sposób stosowania atrybutu do zestawu.The following code example demonstrates how to apply the attribute to an assembly. [!code-csharp[Runtime.CompilerServices.SuppressIldasmAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.CompilerServices.SuppressIldasmAttribute/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.CompilerServices.SuppressIldasmAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.CompilerServices.SuppressIldasmAttribute/vb/sample.vb#1)]
